page.title: 03EDUCATION IN KILTARLITY
page.content: Tomnacross school serves the Kiltarlity area and has 92 pupils and 4 full time staff.There are visiting teachers of remedial, sewing, music and art. The school is 1/2km outside the village and comprises several buildings,one dating back to 1875. Some of these buildings are also used for various clubs such as cubs, old folks and play group. When pupils leave Tomnacross,age 12, they go to Charleston Academy,in Inverness. Shinty is is the main{sport}played by the boys and our team often do well in competitions with other schools.Girls play hockey and will soon enter competitions.Only 28 pupils live in the village of Kiltarlity.37 pupils live more than 2 miles away from the school and so get{transport}provided.
